Package com.satvik.args

Class CannotParseValueOfFlagException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.satvik.args.ArgHandlerException
          • com.satvik.args.FlagException
            • com.satvik.args.CannotParseValueOfFlagException

  • public class CannotParseValueOfFlagException
extends FlagException
    A CannotParseValueOfFlagException describes the nature of an error on parsing values of flags in ArgHandler. This Exception is thrown when a Flag which does not accept values has been given one, or the value assigned is of the wrong type.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 04/09/2016
    Author:
    Satvik Saha
    See Also:
    FlagException, ArgHandlerException, Serialized Form

      Constructor of CannotParseValueOfFlagException, to be used when a Flag cannot carry a value.
      CannotParseValueOfFlagException(Flag<?> flag, java.lang.String value)
      Constructor of CannotParseValueOfFlagException, to be used when a Flag has been given a value of the wrong type.
